channel.title: HumbreHR Beta released
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I can see how supportive this forum is within the first few minutes of signing up and viewing comments and product showcases.
I have been working on a SaaS HR product for small and possibly medium scale businesses, This amazing product will assist startups and budding young entrepreneurs to focus more people (they matter most!).
I'd love to share links to this product as soon as I'm permitted. Edited: a screenshot ![Homepage|690x336](upload://4CplJCIT3sMLRXZl4mxkWn5NVU7.jpeg)

item.title: HumbreHR Beta released

item.description:
Hi everyone,
